<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103834</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085879</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching about Thanksgiving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht über Thanksgiving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignement au sujet de Thanksgiving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensino sobre Thanksgiving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnamento circa Thanksgiving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία για την ημέρα των ευχαριστιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñanza sobre Thanksgiving</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Resources and activities to help you bring historical accuracy, cultural sensitivity, and a broader context to discussions about the quintessentially American holiday.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebsmittel und Aktivitäten, zum Sie zu 
helfen, historische Genauigkeit, kulturelle Empfindlichkeit und einen 
ausgedehnteren Kontext zu den Diskussionen über den fundamental 
amerikanischen Feiertag zu holen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources et activités pour vous aider à 
apporter l'exactitude historique, la sensibilité culturelle, et un 
plus large contexte aux discussions au sujet des vacances 
quintessenciellement américaines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos e atividades para ajudar-lhe trazer a 
exatidão histórica, a sensibilidade cultural, e um contexto mais 
largo às discussões sobre o feriado quintessentially americano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse ed attività per aiutarle a portare 
esattezza storica, sensibilità culturale e un più vasto contesto 
alle discussioni circa la festa quintessentially americana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς και δραστηριότητες για να σας 
βοηθήσει να φέρετε την ιστορική ακρίβεια, την πολιτιστική 
ευαισθησία, και ένα ευρύτερο πλαίσιο στις συζητήσεις για τις 
πεμπτουσιωδώς αμερικανικές διακοπές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos y actividades para ayudarle a traer 
exactitud histórica, sensibilidad cultural, y un contexto más amplio
a las discusiones sobre el día de fiesta quintessentially americano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
